biography: Dominik Lange lives and works in Paris since 1997. Between 1999 and 2007 he shot there most of his fifty films. He is also the authors of more than 3000 photos and negatives. Since 2012 he become a self-made guitarist musician and a sound engineer too, making his own compositions... He is currently working on montage and print effects in an alternative and independent laboratory (l'Abominable in Paris) as well as working on the sound tracks of some of his films by using concrete music and/or electronic sounds environments... Some of his works were selected in 2004 and 2005 for Cot√© Court shorts films festival in Pantin. In June 2003, the collective Jeune Cinema has shown a retrospective of his works.
name: Dominik Lange
